Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 6 seconds  Numerous events were held at Minute Man NHP on Sautrday, April 19, 2014. The day started with a musket and cannon salute at dawn, followed by interpretive demonstrations featuring Capt. Brown's Minute Company. The park also hosted the "Tough Ruck," military personel marching 26.2 miles in memory of America's fallen soldiers.         One Patriot's Day in Concord by Oakfield Productions. A rare, in-depth description and behind the scenes look at Patriot's Day in Concord Massachusetts.                Battle Road 2012 Tactical Demonstration   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 58 seconds  Patriot's Day weekend is an exciting time at Minute Man NHP! Our biggest event is held on the Saturday prior to the official Monday holiday, Battle Road. This event features more than 300 British and Colonial reenactors and a battle demonstration on the actual historic Battle Road.
